analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x2a5d8a5f822cee2f41f24dd65e38ab0233cfef93.sol:
	Contract NeuralTradeToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x2a5d8a5f822cee2f41f24dd65e38ab0233cfef93.sol#175-177)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

NETCrowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x2a5d8a5f822cee2f41f24dd65e38ab0233cfef93.sol#285-317) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2a5d8a5f822cee2f41f24dd65e38ab0233cfef93.sol#301-302)
	-token.transfer(restricted,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2a5d8a5f822cee2f41f24dd65e38ab0233cfef93.sol#304-307)
	-token.transfer(referer,refererTokens) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2a5d8a5f822cee2f41f24dd65e38ab0233cfef93.sol#314-317)

NETCrowdsale.hardcap should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x2a5d8a5f822cee2f41f24dd65e38ab0233cfef93.sol#261)
